entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage, and the target must make a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw, taking 10 ({@damage 3d6}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Ofta är de medlemmar av kriminella organisationer och kontraktsmördare kan hittas i skogens största och mest politiskt komplexa områden. De tjänar mäktiga personer med brist på skrupler och ett överflöd av pengar. Mördare tränas från unga år för att bli dödliga mästare i sitt hantverk, och lär sig hur man smyger sig fram på grangatorna och håller sig gömd i trädkronorna för att kunna ta tid på det perfekta bakhållet. Corvums, med sin naturliga intelligens och slughet, är de bästa lönnmördarna.

monster.name: Corvum Diviner
languages: can also understand Auran but can't speak it

trait.name: Glide
entries: When falling at least 10 feet, the diviner can spend a reaction to fly up to their speed in one direction as they descend. The diviner lands in an unoccupied space at the end of their movement, and takes no falling damage. The diviner cannot glide while carrying heavy objects, heavy weapons, or shields (though they can drop any held items as part of their reaction).

trait.name: Talons
entries: The diviner has advantage on Strength ({@skill Athletics}) checks made to climb any surface their talons could reasonably grip.

trait.name: Skulker
entries: The diviner has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks made in dim light or darkness.

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) slashing damage.

Diviners är specialiserade på esoteriska trollformler och ritualer, som kan användas för att se de ödesfibrer som rör världen. Även när sådana förutsägelser misslyckas avslöjar de vanligtvis användbar information i processen. Corvums uppskattar kunskap i alla dess former, ofta handlar de med hemligheter på samma sätt som andra handlar med varor, och därför dras många till att utöva spåmästarens konst.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The diviner is a 9th level spellcaster. Their spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 14}, +6 to hit with spell attacks). The diviner has the following spells prepared:

monster.name: Corvax Revayne
languages: can also understand Auran but can't speak it

trait.name: Glide
entries: When falling at least 10 feet, Corvax Revayne can spend a reaction to fly up to his speed in one direction as he descends. Corvax lands in an unoccupied space at the end of his movement, and takes no falling damage. Corvax cannot glide while carrying heavy objects, heavy weapons, or shields (though he can drop any held items as part of his reaction).

trait.name: Talons
entries: Corvax Revayne has advantage on Strength ({@skill Athletics}) checks made to climb any surface his talons could reasonably grip.

trait.name: Skulker
entries: Corvax Revayne has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks made in dim light or darkness.

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) slashing damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Corvax Revayne is a 9th level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 14}, +6 to hit with spell attacks). Corvax has the following spells prepared:

entries: Den här slanka dunkla corvum har en fjäderdräkt som liknar den hos en svartnäbbad alfågel. Han är professor i spådomskonst vid Avium, men hans briljanta hjärna hålls ofta tillbaka av paranoia, en olycklig bieffekt av spådomars yrke. Detta har lett till att fakulteten ser försiktigt på hans förutsägelser och har gett honom ett rykte om att vara lite av en udda fågel på campus. Han är dock smart och kapabel och kan vara en nyttig allierad för sällskapet under de två sista delarna av äventyret. Corvax bör aldrig vara i strid.

monster.name: Corvum Necromancer
languages: can also understand Auran but can't speak it

trait.name: Glide
entries: When falling at least 10 feet, the necromancer can spend a reaction to fly up to their speed in one direction as they descend. They land in an unoccupied space at the end of their movement, and take no falling damage. They cannot glide while carrying heavy objects, heavy weapons, or shields (though they can drop any held items as part of their reaction).

trait.name: Talons
entries: The necromancer has advantage on Strength ({@skill Athletics}) checks made to climb any surface their talons could reasonably grip.

trait.name: Convincing
entries: The necromancer has advantage on all Charisma checks used to convince someone of their knowledge of subject matter pertaining to the Arcana skill.

trait.name: Life Leech
entries: Once per turn, when the necromancer kills one or more creatures with a spell of 1st level or higher, they can regain hit points equal to twice the level of the spell, or three times the level if it is a necromancy spell.

action.name: Staff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d6 - 1}) bludgeoning damage, or 3 ({@damage 1d8 - 1}) bludgeoning damage if wielded with both hands.

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) slashing damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The necromancer is a 9th-level spellcaster. Their spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 15}, +7 to hit with spell attacks). The necromancer has the following wizard spells prepared:

entries: Varje kännande varelse är mottaglig för nekromantikens lockelse. Löftena om att få se förlorade nära och kära igen eller att få upp en armé av mäktiga hantlangare kan ibland vara svåra att motstå. Fågelfolket i Humblewood är inte immuna mot den lockelsen. För att hjälpa till att stävja denna nyfikenhet undervisar professorerna vid Avium endast i nekromantisk teori. Men några orädda studenter har varit kända för att i hemlighet följa de praktiska tillämpningarna. Särskilt corvums, som är säkra på sitt intellekt, är ofta villiga att utmana traditioner för kunskapens skull. Som ett resultat av detta har mer än en corvum vandrat ner på de mörka konsternas väg.

monster.name: Odwald Ebonheart
languages: can also understand Auran but can't speak it

trait.name: Glide
entries: When falling at least 10 feet, Odwald can spend a reaction to fly up to his speed in one direction as he descends. Odwald lands in an unoccupied space at the end of his movement, and takes no falling damage. Odwald cannot glide while carrying heavy objects, heavy weapons, or shields (though he can drop any held items as part of his reaction).

trait.name: Talons
entries: Odwald has advantage on Strength ({@skill Athletics}) checks made to climb any surface his talons could reasonably grip.

trait.name: Convincing
entries: Odwald has advantage on all Charisma checks used to convince someone of his knowledge of subject matter pertaining to the Arcana skill.

trait.name: Life Leech
entries: Once per turn, when Odwald kills one or more creatures with a spell of 1st level or higher, he can regain hit points equal to twice the level of the spell, or three times the level if it is a necromancy spell.

action.name: Staff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d6 - 1}) bludgeoning damage, or 3 ({@damage 1d8 - 1}) bludgeoning damage if wielded with both hands.

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) slashing damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Odwald is a 9th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 15}, +7 to hit with spell attacks). Odwald has the following wizard spells prepared:

entries: Odwald är en gammal, mager corvum, som liknar en tjocknäbbad korp med grova, hårade fjädrar, som är rufsig efter många års äventyr. Odwald har ett skarpt sinne men ett svagt hjärta. Odwald är medlem av den illustra Ebonhart-familjen, ett adligt hus som går tillbaka till grundandet av Alderheart, och var ett arkaniskt underbarn som växte upp i en värld som förväntade sig att han skulle vara briljant. Även om magi alltid kom naturligt för honom, tyngde trycket från familjens förväntningar tungt på honom och fyllde honom med en djupt rotad rädsla för att misslyckas. För flera månader sedan lurades han av en okänd varelse att försvaga förseglingen som höll kvar eldaspekten under Scorched Grove. Ända sedan dess har han gett sig själv skulden för de försämrade förhållandena i skogen. Han har ingen lösning för att stoppa aspekten, och detta skrämmer honom. Kort efter att ha räddat sin vän Riffin drev desperationen honom tillbaka till sin alma mater, Avium, där han sedan dess har arbetat med förbjuden magi i hemlighet. Med hjälp av en hemlig dörr som han upptäckte under sin studietid har Odwald omvandlat flera otillgängliga och nedlagda klassrum till ett provisoriskt laboratorium där han outtröttligt arbetar och experimenterar med mörk och farlig magi i hopp om att upptäcka ett sätt att stoppa aspekten. Odwald använder sig av {@creature corvum necromancer|Humblewood} stat-blocket. Hans inriktning är kaotisk neutral.

action.name: Club
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d4}) bludgeoning damage.

Eliza Pennygleam är en eluran, en grupp kattliknande människor från väst. Även om de inte är infödda i Humblewood, ses eluraner ofta längs vägarna som en del av handelskaravaner och bakom handelsbodar i huvudstaden. Eliza är en kunnig köpman som är på väg till Alderheart för att ta över sin avlidna systers butik. Hon är en naturlig köpslagare, men hon är också barmhärtig mot dem som har drabbats av svårigheter. Eliza använder sig av {@creature commoner} stat-blocket. Hon är neutralt god.

trait.name: Standing Leap
entries: A jerbeen's long jump is 30 feet, and their base high jump is 15 feet, with or without a running start.

trait.name: Team Tactics
entries: Jerbeens can take the {@action Help} action as a bonus action.

action.name: Club
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d4}) bludgeoning damage.

En smal, blondpälsad jerbeen med en vänlig natur och ett olyckligt rykte. Figory har studerat i två år vid Avium, men oron för professorernas förväntningar och det komplicerade schema som krävs för fjäderlösa studenter för att navigera på campus har hållit honom tillbaka ett helt år jämfört med andra studenter. Han har blivit mobbad av sina klasskamrater på Avium, och hans senaste möte med kobolskräcken har gjort honom djupt orolig. Han vill desperat att någon ska tro på hans berättelse och vidta åtgärder mot den varelse som lurar runt campus. Figory använder sig av {@creature commoner} stat-blocket, justerat med rasegenskaperna hos en jerbeen. Han är neutral.

monster.name: Gallus Druid
languages: can also understand Auran but can't speak it

trait.name: Glide
entries: When falling at least 10 feet, the druid can spend a reaction to fly up to their speed in one direction as they descend. They land in an unoccupied space at the end of their movement, and take no falling damage. They cannot glide while carrying heavy objects, heavy weapons, or shields (though they can drop any held items as part of their reaction).

trait.name: Wing Flap
entries: As a bonus action, the druid can use their powerful feathered arms to propel themselves upward up to half their movement speed. The druid can use it in conjunction with a regular jump, but not while gliding.

trait.name: Seedspeech
entries: The druid can communicate simple ideas to living plants, and is able to interpret their responses in simple language.

trait.name: Spirit Totem (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: As a bonus action, the druid calls forth a nature spirit. The spirit appears at a point the druid can see within 60 feet. The spirit creates a 30-foot-radius aura. The spirit is neither an object nor a creature, but is a spectral beast. As a bonus action, the druid can move the spirit to another location within 60 feet. The spirit lasts for 1 minute.

entries.name: Bear Spirit
entries: The druid and allies within the aura gain 9 temporary hit points and have advantage on Strength checks and saving throws.

entries.name: Hawk Spirit
entries: The druid can use their reaction to grant advantage to an ally's attack roll against a target in the aura. The druid and allies within the aura have advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks.

entries.name: Unicorn Spirit
entries: If a spell that requires a spell slot heals the druid or allies in the aura, each creature of the druid's choice also gains 4 hit points

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The druid is a 6th-level spellcaster. Their spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 14}, +6 to hit with spell attacks). The druid has the following spells prepared:

action.name: Staff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) bludgeoning damage.

Gallus i Humblewood har en särskilt djup koppling till naturen. Hanera lär dem att se världen från skogsgolvet i stället för från trädkronorna. Detta är ett budskap som många gallus har tagit till sitt hjärta. På grund av denna vördnad för naturen ägnar sig vissa gallus åt att studera och bevara skogen, blir skogens väktare eller fungerar som guider. Några få utvalda med en unik koppling till flora och fauna utvecklar otroliga krafter och förmågor. Dessa druider kan låta träd spira och läka skadade djur med en beröring. De är vördade bland både fågelfolk och humblefolk som andliga ledare och kloka rådgivare.

monster.name: Gallus Monk
languages: can also understand Auran but can't speak it

trait.name: Glide
entries: When falling at least 10 feet, the monk can spend a reaction to fly up to their speed in one direction as they descend. They land in an unoccupied space at the end of their movement, and take no falling damage. They cannot glide while carrying heavy objects, heavy weapons, or shields (though they can drop any held items as part of their reaction).

trait.name: Wing Flap
entries: As a bonus action, the monk can use their powerful feathered arms to propel themselves upward up to half their movement speed. The monk can use it in conjunction with a regular jump, but not while gliding.

trait.name: Wind's Grace
entries: While moving, the monk can move along vertical surfaces and across liquids without falling.

Gallus som inte nöjer sig med att leva sig in i vardagen i små samhällen ger sig ut i avskilda kloster och lär sig munkens väg. Där övervakas en disciplinerad rutin av fysiska ansträngningar och andlig kontemplation av vassa mästare. Efter år av träning anses de initierade vara redo att resa ut i landet och sätta sin inlärning på prov. De flesta återvänder till klostret efter att ha fått en uppenbarelse under sina resor. Andra fortsätter att vandra, ibland med några få betrodda följeslagare, för att för alltid finna ny mening.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The monk makes four attacks, each of which can be an unarmed strike or a dart attack. They can also use their Graceful Step once, either before or after one of the attacks.

action.name: Unarmed Attack
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Dart
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Graceful Step
entries: The monk moves 40 feet. This movement does not provoke {@action opportunity attack|phb|opportunity attacks}.

action.name: Inspiring
entries: The monk inspires an ally that can see and hear them. The ally can roll a {@dice d4} and add the number rolled to their next ability check, attack roll, or saving throw.

monster.name: Gallus Necromancer
languages: can also understand Auran but can't speak it

trait.name: Glide
entries: When falling at least 10 feet, the necromancer can spend a reaction to fly up to their speed in one direction as they descend. The necromancer lands in an unoccupied space at the end of their movement, and takes no falling damage. The necromancer cannot glide while carrying heavy objects, heavy weapons, or shields (though they can drop any held items as part of their reaction).

trait.name: Wing Flap
entries: As a bonus action, the necromancer can use their powerful feathered arms to propel themselves upward up to half their movement speed. The necromancer can use it in conjunction with a regular jump, but not while gliding.

trait.name: Seedspeech
entries: The necromancer can communicate simple ideas to living plants, and is able to interpret their responses in simple language.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The necromancer is a 9th level spellcaster. Their spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 15}, +7 to hit with spell attacks). The necromancer has the following wizard spells prepared:

action.name: Staff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d6 - 1}) bludgeoning damage, or 3 ({@damage 1d8 - 1}) bludgeoning damage if used with both hands.

Gallus dras vanligtvis inte till nekromantik, men några få avvikare med arkan talang och en benägenhet att studera magins mörkare sida har lyckats i Avium. Vanligare är att sådana nekromantiker studerar konsten teoretiskt och lär sig hur den stör balansen mellan liv och död så att deras elever kan lära sig att effektivt motverka sådana vidriga trollformler.

monster.name: Glinda Nightseed
languages: can also understand Auran but can't speak it

trait.name: Glide
entries: When falling at least 10 feet, Glinda can spend a reaction to fly up to her speed in one direction as she descends. Glinda lands in an unoccupied space at the end of her movement, and takes no falling damage. Glinda cannot glide while carrying heavy objects, heavy weapons, or shields (though she can drop any held items as part of her reaction).

trait.name: Wing Flap
entries: As a bonus action, Glinda can use her powerful feathered arms to propel herself upward up to half her movement speed. Glinda can use it in conjunction with a regular jump, but not while gliding.

trait.name: Seedspeech
entries: Glinda can communicate simple ideas to living plants, and is able to interpret their responses in simple language.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Glinda is a 9th level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 15}, +7 to hit with spell attacks). Glinda has the following wizard spells prepared:

action.name: Staff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d6 - 1}) bludgeoning damage, or 3 ({@damage 1d8 - 1}) bludgeoning damage if used with both hands.

This huden gallus' plumage resembles a ptarmigan, and she usually wears a pince-nez on her beak. A professor of advanced theoretical necromancy, Glinda is known for having strange opinions about her field of study. Unlike most birdfolk, she sees necromancy as a manipulation of life energies on par with druidic magic. She is a kind soul, and only practices the lighter forms of necromancy. However, she has been performing secret experiments on the servitor skeletons in the Avium, hoping to develop a cutting-edge resurrection spell. This violates campus policies, which ban practical necromancy, and could cause her to lose her job. Glinda uses the gallus necromancer stat block. Her alignment is chaotic good.

monster.name: Gregor Thornspur, Magistrate of Alderheart
languages: can also understand Auran but can't speak it

trait.name: Glide
entries: When falling at least 10 feet, Gregor can spend a reaction to fly up to his speed in one direction as he descends. He lands in an unoccupied space at the end of his movement, and takes no falling damage. He cannot glide while carrying heavy objects, heavy weapons, or shields (though he can drop any held items as part of his reaction).

trait.name: Wing Flap
entries: As a bonus action, Gregor can use his powerful feathered arms to propel himself upward a distance equal to half his movement speed. He can use it in conjunction with a regular jump, but not while gliding.

trait.name: Fated (Recharges after a Long Rest)
entries: Gregor can choose to reroll any attack roll, skill check, or saving throw.

trait.name: Damage Resistance
entries: Gregor is resistant to poison damage.

trait.name: Resilience
entries: Gregor has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition poisoned}.

action.name: Rapier
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: Gregor adds 2 to his AC against one melee attack that would hit him. To do so, Gregor must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

Gregor är en tråkig sabel luma med en enda felande fjäder som sticker ut konstigt från pannan. Gregor är Alderhearts magistrat, och även om han verkar vara en trött byråkrat döljer hans uppträdande en smart affärsman som är ivrig att vända varje situation till sin fördel. Han är inte främmande för att ta emot mutor i utbyte mot att påskynda förfrågningar om att få träffa fågelfolksrådet. Gregor använder sig av {@creature noble} stat-blocket, justerat med ras-egenskaperna hos sable luma. Han är kaotiskt neutral.

monster.name: Hedge Bard
languages: can also speak with beasts of any size which represent spiders, insects, worms, or other bugs

trait.name: Taunt (2/Day)
entries: The bard can use a bonus action on their turn to target one creature within 30 feet of them. If the target can hear the bard, the target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Charisma saving throw or have disadvantage on ability checks, attack rolls, and saving throws until the start of the bard's next turn

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The bard is a 4th-level spellcaster. Their spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 13}, +5 to hit with spell attacks). They have the following bard spells prepared:

action.name: Multiattack
entries: he bard makes two weapon attacks, one with their rapier and one with their dagger.

action.name: Rapier
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Curl Up
entries: The bard curls up into a spiny ball. While curled up in this way they cannot move, attack, or cast spells with somatic components, and their base armor class becomes 19. Any creature that misses the hedge bard with a melee attack while they are curled up takes {@dice 2d4} points of piercing damage from their sharp quills. If a creature hits the bard while they are curled up, however, the bard is knocked {@condition prone} in their space at the end of the turn. The bard may uncurl themselves at any point during their turn.

Häckar är kända för att vara utmärkta diplomater och medlare, men är mindre kända för sin kärlek till musik. De som vänder sin naturliga charm mot talangen att underhålla kan nå stor framgång. Några av de mest begåvade artisterna är välsignade med magiska talanger. Medan de flesta häckar använder dessa krafter för det goda, väljer andra en mer ondskefull väg och använder sina bardiska talanger för att fuska, lura eller stjäla från vanligt folk.

monster.name: Hedge Witch
languages: can also speak with beasts of any size which represent spiders insects worms or other bugs

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The witch is a 2nd-level spellcaster. Their spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 13}, +5 to hit with spell attacks). The witch has the following warlock spells prepared:

action.name: Staff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 1} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d6 - 1}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Fiendish Vigor
entries: The witch can cast {@spell false life} at will as a 1st-level spell.

action.name: Curl Up
entries: The witch curls up into a spiny ball. While curled up in this way they cannot move, attack, or cast spells with somatic components, and their base armor class becomes 19. Any creature that misses the witch with a melee attack while they are curled up takes {@dice 2d4} points of piercing damage from their sharp quills. If a creature hits the witch while they are curled up, however, the witch is knocked {@condition prone} in their space at the end of the turn. The witch may uncurl themselves at any point during their turn.

Många som ansöker om att få studera vid Avium nekas av den prestigefyllda institutionen. Pådrivna av sin önskan om kunskap börjar de avvisade kandidaterna ibland att bli självlärda mästare i arkana. Häckar som följer en individualistisk väg och som är särskilt väl samspelta med skogens magi utnyttjar ofta sin koppling till dessa naturkrafter för att ingå pakter med mäktiga fey- eller elementarvarelser och lära sig hemligheter som är oåtkomliga för traditionella studenter.

trait.name: Dark One's Blessing
entries: When the witch reduces a hostile creature to 0 hit points, the witch gains 5 temporary hit points.

trait.name: Repelling Blast
entries: When the witch hits a creature with eldritch blast, they can push the creature up to 10 feet away in a straight line.

monster.name: Susan of the Swamp
languages: can also speak with beasts of any size which represent spiders, insects, worms, or other bugs

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Susan is a 2nd-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 13}, +5 to hit with spell attacks). Susan has the following warlock spells prepared:

action.name: Staff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 1} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d6 - 1}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Fiendish Vigor
entries: Susan can cast {@spell false life} at will as a 1st-level spell.

action.name: Curl Up
entries: Susan curls up into a spiny ball. While curled up in this way she cannot move, attack, or cast spells with somatic components, and her base armor class becomes 19. Any creature that misses Susan with a melee attack while she is curled up takes {@dice 2d4} points of piercing damage from her sharp quills. If a creature hits Susan while she is curled up, however, Susan is knocked {@condition prone} in her space at the end of the turn. Susan may uncurl herself at any point during her turn.

Susan är en excentrisk häck vars magiska förmåga alltid har överträffats av hennes hunger efter kunskap. Hon studerade vid Avium under en kort tid, men lämnade det på eget bevåg för att experimentera med magi som Avium ansåg vara osmaklig. Susan har nyligen bosatt sig i träsket i hopp om att kunna ägna sig åt sina arkaiska kuriositeter i fred. Hon delar sitt blygsamma hem med sin bekanta skalbagge, Normal, och tillbringar sin tid med att leta efter ingredienser, testa trollformler och läsa kriminalromaner och böcker om eldritch lore. Även om hon utför sina ritualer på ett säkert avstånd från städerna har hennes närvaro i regionen gjort Magistraten i Winnowing Reach orolig, och han vill att hon ska försvinna. Susan använder sig av {@creature hedge witch|Humblewood} stat-blocket. Hennes inriktning är chaotiskt god.

trait.name: Dark One's Blessing
entries: When Susan reduces a hostile creature to 0 hit points, she gains 5 temporary hit points.

trait.name: Repelling Blast
entries: When Susan hits a creature with eldritch blast, she can push the creature up to 10 feet away in a straight line.

monster.name: Jell Platena
languages: can also understand Auran but can't speak it

action.name: Club
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d4}) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Fated (Recharges after a Long Rest)
entries: Jell can choose to reroll any attack roll, skill check, or saving throw.

trait.name: Songbird (Recharges after a Long Rest)
entries: Jell can cast {@spell charm person}. Charisma is her spellcasting ability and the spell does not require any somatic components to cast.

Jell is a bespectacled sera luma with bright red plumage resembling a cardinal. Jell has studied at the Avium for three years now, and is well on her way to becoming a graduate. She is bright and studious, and serious about everything she does in life. Jell uses the commoner stat block, adjusted with the racial traits of a sera luma. She is neutral good.

trait.name: Standing Leap
entries: The thief's long jump is up to 30 feet and their high jump is up to 15 feet, with or without a running start.

trait.name: Team Tactics
entries: The thief can take the {@action Help} action as a bonus action.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The thief makes two dagger attacks.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Opportunist
entries: When a creature fails a melee attack roll against the thief, the thief can make a Dexterity ({@skill Sleight of Hand}) check against a DC equal to 10 + the target creature's Dexterity modifier. On a success, the thief steals one item of the GMs choosing from the target. It cannot be an item actively held or worn by the target.

Kriminella kan ofta hittas när de tar pengar i de stora perch-städerna, men det är bara de mest framgångsrika som rekryteras av Bandit Coalition. Jerbeens är små och kan lätt röra sig obemärkt; deras snabbhet är orsaken till uttrycket "snabb som en jerbeen". Detta, tillsammans med deras naturliga charm, gör jerbeens perfekt lämpade för tjuvkonsten.

trait.name: Standing Leap
entries: The swashbuckler's base long jump is 30 feet, and their base high jump is 15 feet, with or without a running start.

trait.name: Team Tactics
entries: The swashbuckler can take the {@action Help} action as a bonus action.

trait.name: Sharp Witted Defense
entries: While the swashbuckler is wearing light or no armor and wielding no shield, their AC includes their Charisma modifier.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The swashbuckler makes three attacks, one with a dagger and two with their rapier.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Rapier
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Riposte
entries: The swashbuckler reduces the damage dealt by one melee attack that would hit them by 4 ({@dice 1d8}), and deals that much piercing damage to their attacker. The swashbuckler must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

En swashbuckler är en vanlig figur i många jerbeen-sagor och är en mästare som slåss med finess och djärvhet. De är naturliga ledare och håller sig vid gott mod under en duell och utnyttjar små fördelar för att vinna dagen. Jerbeen-svashbucklare tränar ofta i traditionen från sin Amaranthine, Gaspard. Varje år deltar svärdsmännen i fäktningsmatcher som hålls till Gaspards ära. Inte alla swashbucklers följer denna väg, vissa använder sina talanger för brigantverksamhet.

monster.name: Kenna Brightspark
languages: can also understand Auran but can't speak it

action.name: Club
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d4}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d4}) slashing damage.

trait.name: Glide
entries: When falling at least 10 feet, Kenna can spend a reaction to fly up to her speed in one direction as she descends. Kenna lands in an unoccupied space at the end of her movement, and takes no falling damage. Kenna cannot glide while carrying heavy objects, heavy weapons, or shields (though she can drop any held items as part of her reaction).

trait.name: Talons
entries: Kenna has advantage on Strength ({@skill Athletics}) checks made to climb any surface her talons could reasonably grip.

trait.name: Learned
entries: Kenna gains proficiency in one of the following skills: {@skill Arcana}, {@skill History}, {@skill Nature}, or {@skill Religion}.

trait.name: Skulker
entries: Kenna has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks made in dim light or darkness.

En energisk och nyfiken ung dusk corvum-forskare som för närvarande arbetar med en avhandling i Winnowing Reach. Kennas forskning fokuserar på egenskaperna hos olika slem i regionen. Hon är elev i Avium och hoppas att hennes resultat ska ge henne ett stipendium för att finansiera ännu fler studier av dessa fascinerande varelser. Kenna är född i Winnowing Reach och känner till byn väl. Hon är lite fördomsfull och tar risker för sitt arbete. Kenna använder sig av {@creature commoner} stat-blocket, justerat med rasegenskaperna hos en dusk corvum. Hon är chaotiskt god.

monster.name: Luma Cleric of Ardea
languages: can understand Auran but can't speak it

trait.name: Glide
entries: When falling at least 10 feet, the cleric can spend a reaction to fly up to their speed in one direction as they descend. They land in an unoccupied space at the end of their movement, and take no falling damage. They cannot glide while carrying heavy objects, or heavy weapons, or shields (though they can drop any held items as part of their reaction).

trait.name: Wing Flap
entries: As a bonus action, the cleric can use their powerful feathered arms to propel themselves upward up to half their movement speed. The cleric can use this in conjunction with a regular jump, but not while gliding.

trait.name: Fated (Recharges after a Long Rest)
entries: The luma cleric can choose to reroll any attack roll, skill check, or saving throw.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The cleric is a 5th-level spellcaster. Their spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 13}, +5 to hit with spell attacks). The cleric has the following cleric spells prepared:

action.name: Staff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6}) bludgeoning damage, or 4 ({@damage 1d8}) bludgeoning damage if used with both hands.

action.name: Ardea's Vigor (1/Day)
entries: The cleric calls on the powers of Ardea to imbue their allies with her protective life force. The luma cleric and up to 3 allies within 30 feet gain 5 ({@dice 2d4}) temporary hit points. For one minute, anyone under this effect gains 5 temporary hit points at the start of each of their turns.

action.name: Songbird (Recharges after a Long Rest)
entries: The cleric can cast {@spell charm person}. Charisma is their spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 12}) and the spell does not require any somatic components to cast.

Ardeas präster reser genom skogen på heliga pilgrimsfärder till heliga lundar som prunkar av liv som fostrats av Dawnmother. De sprider Ardeas budskap om vänlighet vart de än går och tar på sig att skydda allt liv, stort och smått. Kleriker tjänar de samhällen de passerar genom som helare, medlare och ibland som tappra försvarare. Lumas som följer Amarantins kallelse finner att deras naturliga karisma och mystiska talanger är till stor hjälp när de vandrar prästens väg.

trait.name: Glide
entries: When falling at least 10 feet, the wizard can spend a reaction to fly up to their speed in one direction as they descend. They land in an unoccupied space at the end of their movement, and take no falling damage. They cannot glide while carrying heavy objects, heavy weapons, or shields (though they can drop any held items as part of their reaction).

trait.name: Wing Flap
entries: As a bonus action, the wizard can use their powerful feathered arms to propel themselves upward up to half their movement speed. The wizard can use it in conjunction with a regular jump, but not while gliding.

trait.name: Fated (Recharges after a Long Rest)
entries: The wizard can choose to reroll any attack, skill check, or saving throw.

trait.name: Resilience
entries: The wizard has advantage on saving throws against poison.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The wizard is a 10th-level spellcaster. Their spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 15}, +7 to hit with spell attacks). The wizard has the following spells prepared:

action.name: Staff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d6 - 1}) bludgeoning damage.

Det är en utbredd tro bland fågelfolket att endast de med fokuserade sinnen kan bemästra magins subtila konst. Av okända skäl, kanske deras inneboende koppling till ödet eller deras speciella sätt att förhålla sig till världen, kan lumas med lätthet utnyttja de mystiska och magiska krafterna.

reaction.name: Charming (3/Day)
entries: When a creature makes an attack against the wizard, the creature must succeed on a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or target the next closest creature within range. If multiple creatures are closest, the attacker chooses. This feature does not work if there are no other creatures within range

trait.name: Glide
entries: When falling at least 10 feet, Gabe can spend a reaction to fly up to his speed in one direction as he descends. He lands in an unoccupied space at the end of his movement, and takes no falling damage. He cannot glide while carrying heavy objects, heavy weapons, or shields (though he can drop any held items as part of his reaction).

trait.name: Wing Flap
entries: As a bonus action, Gabe can use his powerful feathered arms to propel himself upward up to half his movement speed. Gabe can use it in conjunction with a regular jump, but not while gliding.

trait.name: Fated (Recharges after a Long Rest)
entries: Gabe can choose to reroll any attack, skill check, or saving throw.

trait.name: Resilience
entries: Gabe has advantage on saving throws against poison.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Gabe is a 10th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 15}, +7 to hit with spell attacks). Gabe has the following spells prepared:

action.name: Staff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d6 - 1}) bludgeoning damage.

Gabe är en medelålders sable luma med en stor plym av iriserande fjädrar som omger hans nacke som en kåpa. Gabe, som är dekanus i Avium, ser alltid ut som om han är djupt försjunken i tankar. Även om hans vänlighet och knasiga beteende gör att folk underskattar honom, finns det under det udda yttre ett skarpt sinne som noggrant utvärderar alla möjligheter innan han agerar. Han är en godmodig forskare som är lika angelägen om sina anställdas och studenters välbefinnande som han är om kvaliteten på forskning och utbildning inom Avium. Dean Windsworth använder sig av {@creature luma wizard|Humblewood} statblocket. Hans inriktning är neutral god.

reaction.name: Charming (3/Day)
entries: When a creature makes an attack against Gabe, the creature must succeed on a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or target the next closest creature within range. If multiple creatures are closest, the attacker chooses. This feature does not work if there are no other creatures within range

trait.name: Resilience
entries: The bandit has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition poisoned}.

trait.name: Skulker
entries: The bandit has advantage on {@skill Stealth} checks made in dim light or total darkness.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) piercing damage.

action.name: Shortbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 3} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) piercing damage.

Mapachs är särskilt misstrodda bland fågelfolket på grund av sina excentriska drag och sin vilja att bryta mot gängse seder och bruk. Vissa mapachs har svårt att integreras i fågelfolksamhället och tar till brottslighet för att överleva. Lokala banditstyrkor utnyttjar gärna detta och erbjuder de fördrivna mapachs skydd och en del av bytet i utbyte mot deras tjänster.

trait.name: Resilience
entries: The brute has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition poisoned}.

trait.name: Skulker
entries: The brute has advantage on {@skill Stealth} checks made in dim light or total darkness.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The brute makes three melee attacks, two with their rapier and one with their parrying dagger.

action.name: Rapier
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Parrying Dagger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

Även om många i banditkoalitionen följer ädla ideal har det alltid funnits en handfull opålitliga medlemmar som bara är intresserade av sin egen utveckling. Dessa hänsynslösa bruttor är skurkar genom och genom, villiga att ta makten inom koalitionen med alla nödvändiga medel. Mapachs har inte fler skurkar bland sig som en självklarhet, men den vanära som ett fåtal sådana skurkar har ytterligare besudlat deras rykte i perch-dwellers ögon.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: The brute adds 2 to his AC against one melee attack that would hit them. The brute must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

trait.name: Resilience
entries: Krall has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition poisoned}.

trait.name: Skulker
entries: Krall has advantage on {@skill Stealth} checks made in dim light or total darkness.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Krall makes three melee attacks, two with his rapier and one with his parrying dagger.

action.name: Rapier
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Parrying Dagger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

Krall är en imponerande mapach, nästan 1,80 meter lång, med en solid kroppsbyggnad och en matt päls som saknas på vissa ställen. Han var nära vän med Benna, även om han inte delade hennes altruism och istället ansåg att de som inte kunde bära sin vikt borde lämnas kvar. Han förväntar sig fullständig lojalitet från sina anhängare och föredrar hit-and-run-taktik. Han och hans trupper kräver tullar av dåligt försvarade karavaner för att få passera längs vägarna, vilket många betalar för att undvika hans vrede. Krall använder sig av {@creature mapach brute|Humblewood} stat-blocket.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: Krall adds 2 to his AC against one melee attack that would hit him. Krall must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

trait.name: Resilience
entries: The tinkerer has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition poisoned}.

trait.name: Skulker
entries: The tinkerer has advantage on {@skill Stealth} checks made in dim light or total darkness.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Tinker's Toys
entries: The tinkerer uses one of the following options (roll a {@dice d4} or choose one); the tinkerer can use each one no more than once per day:

entries.name: 1. Cogwork Bird
entries: The tinkerer winds and releases a small mechanical bird that flies to a target creature within 30 feet and distracts it. The next attack against that creature is made with advantage.

entries.name: 2. Flash-bangs
entries: The tinkerer targets a space up to 10 ft. away, and throws some small explosive shells that flare up in a blinding light. All creatures within 10 ft. of the target space must make a {@dc 11} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition blinded} until the start of the tinkerer's next turn.

entries.name: 3. Nettle Gun
entries: The tinkerer turns the crank on a small gadget that sprays nettles at a target. {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 10/20 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage. All creatures within 5 ft. of the target must make a {@dc 11} Dexterity saving throw or take 5 ({@damage 1d10}) piercing damage.

entries.name: 4. Grease Balloon
entries: The tinkerer targets a 10-foot by 10-foot area up to 15 feet away, and makes it slick with grease. The area is considered difficult terrain, and each creature standing in the area must succeed on a {@dc 11} Dexterity saving throw or fall {@condition prone}. A creature that enters the area or ends its turn there must also succeed on a {@dc 11} Dexterity saving throw or fall {@condition prone}.

Till skillnad från dem som nöjer sig med att hålla sig inom gränserna för sitt etablerade hantverk har de som pysslar en passion för innovation som inte hindras av traditioner. Mapach-hantverkare som ständigt letar efter sätt att förbättra tidigare skapelser får sig själva stämplade som excentriker. Deras metoder är okonventionella men ytterst praktiska. Designen är ofta noggrant genomtänkt, och vissa av deras innovationer får så småningom en utbredd användning runt om i Wood.

monster.name: Mordane Swiftgale
languages: can also understand Auran but can't speak it

action.name: Club
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) slashing damage.

trait.name: Patterned Feathers
entries: Mordane has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks when he attempts to hide in a forest.

trait.name: Talons
entries: Mordane has advantage on Strength ({@skill Athletics}) checks made to climb any surface his talons could reasonably grip.

Mordane är en gammal, prydlig och prydlig snabbstrig, som håller sina gråvita fjädrar putsade och sin bibliotekariekostym nypressad. Han är klok men gammalmodig och föredrar att läsa i ensamhet när han är ledig, hellre än att umgås med sina kollegor. Trots sina sociala brister är han en erfaren bibliotekarie och har en otrolig kunskap om även de äldsta delarna av det nedre biblioteket. Mordane använder sig av {@creature commoner} stat-blocket, justerat med rasegenskaperna hos en snabb strig. Han är neutral.

trait.name: False Appearance (Treant)
entries: While Oakheart remains motionless, he appears as a great oak with charred bark that smolders in places and flames in place of leaves.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: The Oakheart deals double damage to objects and structures.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Oakheart makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d6 + 5}) fire damage.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 8} to hit, range 60/180 ft., one target. {@h}28 ({@damage 4d10 + 5}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Animate Trees (1/Day)
entries: Oakheart magically animates one or two trees he can see within 60 feet of him. These trees have the same statistics as Oakheart, except they have Intelligence and Charisma scores of 1, they can't speak, and they have only the Slam action option. An animated tree acts as an ally of Oakheart. The tree remains animate for 1 day or until it dies; until Oakheart dies or is more than 120 feet from the tree; or until Oakheart takes a bonus action to turn him back into an inanimate tree. The tree then takes root if possible.

Oakheart är en enorm trädformad varelse med förkolnad bark som pyr på vissa ställen, och många små lågor som brinner på grenarna och ger intryck av löv. En gång i tiden var han en trädträdare och badade i Scorched Groves ursprungliga energier, vilket förvandlade honom till en varelse som är så fullständigt besatt av elementet flamma att han kan fungera som {@item Borealus|Humblewood|The Borealus'} väktare. Han är artefaktens väktare och kommer inte att lämna ifrån sig staven förrän han har blivit övertygad om att den som har stört honom kan kontrollera stavens avsevärda kraft och att de menar att de tänker upprätthålla den naturliga balans som han offrade sig själv för att skydda.

monster.name: Raptor Explorer
languages: can also understand Auran but can't speak it

trait.name: Glide
entries: When falling at least 10 feet, the explorer can spend a reaction to fly up to their speed in one direction as they descend. They land in an unoccupied space at the end of their movement, and take no falling damage. They cannot glide while carrying heavy objects, heavy weapons, or shields (though they can drop any held items as part of their reaction).

trait.name: Talons
entries: The explorer rolls advantage on Strength ({@skill Athletics}) checks made to climb any surface their talons could reasonably grip.

trait.name: Patient
entries: When the explorer reacts with a readied action, they have advantage on the first attack roll, skill check, or ability check they make as a part of that action.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
entries: The explorer has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

trait.name: Sure Footing
entries: The explorer ignores non-magical difficult terrain.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The explorer makes two melee attacks or two attacks with their hand crossbow.

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Saber
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) slashing damage.

action.name: Hand Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

Vare sig de lockas av berättelser om skatter eller av lockelsen av avlägsna länder reser vissa invånare i Humblewood för att söka efter avlägsna ruiner eller avlägsna vyer för att tillfredsställa sin vandringslust. Utforskare är vanliga bland raptorerna, och många av dem gör det av vördnad för Amaranthine Reya, resenärernas guide och beskyddare. Många utforskare ger sig ut på sådana äventyr för att upptäcka sig själva och utvecklas personligen. De som har gjort ett liv av att utforska finner ofta att deras tjänster som guider är mycket efterfrågade.

monster.name: Raptor Ranger
languages: can also understand Auran but can't speak it

trait.name: Glide
entries: When falling at least 10 feet, the ranger can spend

a reaction to fly up to their speed in one direction as they descend. They land in an unoccupied space at the end of their movement, and take no falling damage. They cannot glide while carrying heavy objects, heavy weapons, or shields (though they can drop any held items as part of their reaction).

trait.name: Talons
entries: The ranger rolls advantage on Strength ({@skill Athletics}) checks made to climb any surface their talons could reasonably grip.

trait.name: Aerial Defense
entries: Creatures who attack the ranger while the ranger is falling, gliding, or jumping have disadvantage on their attack roll.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
entries: The explorer has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

trait.name: Arrow Sight (3/Day)
entries: When the ranger attacks with their red-feather bow, they can use their bonus action to see from the point the arrow struck as if they were there. If the arrow strikes a creature, the ranger can see from the creature's perspective. This effect lasts for 1 minute.

trait.name: Hunter (3/Day)
entries: As a bonus action, the ranger can deal an extra {@dice 1d10} damage on their next attack made with a shortbow or longbow.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The ranger makes two red-feather bow attacks.

action.name: Red-Feather Bow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw, rw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage.

Ranger är en ikonisk figur i berättelser och myter om rovdjur och har inspirerat många att följa i deras legendariska fotspår. De är utrustade för ett hårt liv i vildmarken och är fulländade bågskyttar och exceptionella jägare. Med sin övernaturliga syn och snabba reflexer är raptorerna idealiska för jägarlivet. Många som valt denna väg finner sig själva som inspiration till nya berättelser.
Den raptor ranger som anges är utrustad med en {@item red-feather bow|Humblewood} (se {@book Appendix D: New Magic Items|hwcs|8}).

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The ranger is a 3rd-level spellcaster. Their spellcasting ability is
Wisdom (spell save {@dc 13}, + 5 to hit with spell attacks). The ranger has the following spells prepared:

monster.name: Rhys Birchwalker
languages: can also understand Auran but can't speak it

action.name: Club
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d4}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) slashing damage.

trait.name: Hunter's Training
entries: Rhys has proficiency with the {@item longbow|phb}, {@item shortbow|phb}, and {@item spear|phb}. Additionally, her familiarity with the longbow means that it is not considered a heavy weapon for her.

trait.name: Talons
entries: Rhys has advantage on Strength ({@skill Athletics}) checks made to climb any surface her talons could reasonably grip.

trait.name: Aerial Defense
entries: Creatures who attack Rhys while she ranger is falling, gliding, or jumping have disadvantage on their attack roll.

Denna medelålders mistralraptor, som är docent i besvärjelse vid Avium, har inte mycket mystisk talang, men hon kompenserar för det med en entusiasm för att lära sig och en mängd kunskap om sitt valda ämne. Hon är väl insatt i besvärjningsteori och kan förse karaktärer med all den information de annars skulle hitta i {@b Conjuration Magic} (se {@adventure Into the Library|hwcs|4|Into the Library}) om hon tillfrågas om ämnet direkt. Professor Birchwalker kan också hjälpa en karaktär att utföra beräkningarna för att hitta platsen för besvärjningscirkeln i lunden. Rhys använder {@creature commoner} stat-blocket, justerat med rasegenskaperna hos en mistralraptor. Hon är neutralt god.

monster.name: Strig Knight
languages: can also understand Auran but can't speak it

trait.name: Glide
entries: When falling at least 10 feet, the knight can spend a reaction to fly up to their speed in one direction as they descend. They land in an unoccupied space at the end of their movement, and take no falling damage. They cannot glide while carrying heavy objects, heavy weapons, or shields (though they can drop any held items as part of their reaction).

trait.name: Talons
entries: The knight rolls advantage on Strength ({@skill Athletics}) checks made to climb any surface their talons could reasonably grip.

trait.name: Maneuver (2/Day)
entries: When the knight hits with an attack, they can choose to maneuver the enemy out of position, granting an ally within 5 feet of the target the opportunity to use their reaction to move away from this enemy at half their movement speed without provoking an {@action opportunity attack|phb|attack of opportunity}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The knight makes two short sword attacks.

action.name: Short Sword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage. The knight can choose to grapple a target hit by this attack as a bonus action.

action.name: Wing Crest Shield (1/Day)
entries: The knight casts the {@spell gust of wind} spell (save {@dc 15}).

Perch Guard producerar många skickliga soldater, men endast de som har stor talang utbildas till riddare. Riddarna i Alderhearts Perch Guard får lära sig att skydda andra genom att skapa möjligheter för allierade att omgruppera sig eller dra sig tillbaka vid behov. Riddarna är experter på strid med svärd och sköld och deras tungt bepansrade stridsstil gör det möjligt för dem att hålla linjen även mot de hårdaste fienderna. Den listade strig riddaren är utrustad med en {@item wing crest shield|Humblewood} (se {@book Appendix D: New Magic Items|hwcs|8}).

monster.name: Riffin, the Ash-Knight
languages: can also understand Auran but can't speak it

trait.name: Glide
entries: When falling at least 10 feet, Riffin can spend a reaction to fly up to his speed in one direction as he descends. He lands in an unoccupied space at the end of his movement, and takes no falling damage. He cannot glide while carrying heavy objects, heavy weapons, or shields (though he can drop any held items as part of his reaction).

trait.name: Talons
entries: Riffin rolls advantage on Strength ({@skill Athletics}) checks made to climb any surface his talons could reasonably grip.

trait.name: Maneuver (2/Day)
entries: When Riffin hits with an attack, he can choose to maneuver the enemy out of position, granting an ally within 5 feet of the target the opportunity to use their reaction to move away from this enemy at half their movement speed without provoking an {@action opportunity attack|phb|attack of opportunity}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Riffin makes two short sword attacks.

action.name: Short Sword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage. The knight can choose to grapple a target hit by this attack as a bonus action.

action.name: Wing Crest Shield (1/Day)
entries: Riffin casts the {@spell gust of wind} spell (save {@dc 15}).

Riffin är en liten, kraftig strig, som står några centimeter över tre fot och vars fjäderdräkt och proportioner påminner om en liten uggla. Riffin är en resande riddare i riket och bodde i Ashbarrow innan det förstördes, och bars till Alderheart av sin vän Odwald, som räddade honom från elden. Eftersom han var en av de enda riddarna som kom från Ashbarrow började folk kalla honom "Ash-Knight", en titel som han nu använder för att hålla minnet av sitt hem vid liv. Riffin är en enkel strig med ett charmigt sätt att se på världen. Han är också en orubblig krigare som tror starkt på att göra det som är rätt, hjälpa dem som behöver hjälp och hedra sina skulder. Riffin använder sig av {@creature strig knight|Humblewood} stat-blocket. Hans inriktning är lagligt god.

monster.name: Strig Tracker
languages: can also understand Auran but can't speak it

trait.name: Glide
entries: When falling at least 10 feet, the tracker can spend a reaction to fly up to their speed in one direction as they descend. They land in an unoccupied space at the end of their movement, and take no falling damage. They cannot glide while carrying heavy objects, heavy weapons, or shields (though they can drop any held items as part of their reaction).

trait.name: Talons
entries: The tracker rolls advantage on Strength ({@skill Athletics}) checks made to climb any surface their talons could reasonably grip.

trait.name: Patterned Feathers
entries: The tracker has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks when they attempt to hide in a forest.

trait.name: Reya's Keen Eye
entries: The tracker can make Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks as a bonus action to try and find hidden creatures.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The tracker makes two melee attacks, one with their longsword and one with their hand axe. Or they make two ranged attacks with their hand axe.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage or 8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) slashing damage if wielding with both hands.

action.name: Hand Axe
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage.

Spårare kan röra sig snabbt i vildmarken och hjälper till att hitta dem som har gått vilse i skogen. De är skickliga överlevare och känner till dolda vägar i skogen. Många av dem har bildat band med dessa varelser och finner deras hjälp användbar när de letar efter vilsna resenärer. För Strigs, som är kända för att vara bekväma även i de hårdaste miljöerna, kan det vara en tillfredsställande utmaning att bli spårare. Vissa använder sina färdigheter för att dubbla rollen som prisjägare, vilket kan ge en ännu mer spännande jakt.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The tracker is a 3rd-level spellcaster. Their spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 12}, +4 to hit with spell attacks). The strig tracker has the following ranger spells prepared:

monster.name: Havel of the Autumn Moon
languages: can also understand Auran but can't speak it

trait.name: Glide
entries: When falling at least 10 feet, Havel can spend a reaction to fly up to his speed in one direction as he descends. He lands in an unoccupied space at the end of his movement, and takes no falling damage. Havel cannot glide while carrying heavy objects, heavy weapons, or shields (though he can drop any held items as part of their reaction).

trait.name: Wing Flap
entries: As a bonus action, Havel can use his powerful feathered arms to propel himself upward up to half his movement speed. He can use it in conjunction with a regular jump, but not while gliding.

trait.name: Seedspeech
entries: Havel can communicate simple ideas to living plants, and is able to interpret their responses in simple language.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Havel is a 4th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 13}, +5 to hit with spell attacks). He has the following spells prepared:

entries: Havel är en skör men modig huden gallus med fasanliknande fjäderdräkt. Han är en god vän till Tevor, och de två har fallit för varandra under sin tid tillsammans i Alderheart. Havel är en Summerblossom, en rang som ges till erfarna medlemmar av Tenders. Han har arbetat på Tenders högkvarter i Trunk-distriktet, där han ger hjälp till flyktingarna. Han är också skicklig på att använda naturlig magi, och även om han normalt sett är för sjuk för att ge sig ut på äventyr kan han ändå hjälpa gruppen med sina talanger.

monster.name: Tevor of the Spring Path
languages: can also understand Auran but can't speak it

trait.name: Glide
entries: When falling at least 10 feet, Tevor can spend a reaction to fly up to his speed in one direction as he descends. He lands in an unoccupied space at the end of his movement, and takes no falling damage. He cannot glide while carrying heavy objects, heavy weapons, or shields (though he can drop any held items as part of his reaction).

trait.name: Wing Flap
entries: As a bonus action, Tevor can use his powerful feathered arms to propel himself upward up to half his movement speed. He can use it in conjunction with a regular jump, but not while gliding.

trait.name: Fated (Recharges after a Long Rest)
entries: Tevor can choose to reroll any attack roll, skill check, or saving throw.

trait.name: Resilience
entries: Tevor rolls with advantage on saving throws against being {@condition poisoned}.

trait.name: Drop Attack
entries: Tevor can make an attack during his glide. If he does, he deals an extra 4 ({@dice 1d8}) points of damage.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage or 6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage if used with both hands.

action.name: Tender Healing (Recharges after a Long Rest)
entries: Tevor casts the {@spell cure wounds} spell at 1st level. Wisdom is his spellcasting ability for this spell.

Tevor är en blyg sable luma med rödgrå fjädrar och en kort näbb. Han är en god vän till Havel och har börjat känna tillgivenhet för gallus sedan de arbetade tillsammans. Tevor är en Sapling, en lågt rankad medlem av Tenders, som med nöd och näppe klarade sig undan en ashnakeattack som dödade hans mentor. Även om han har gått med på att ge sin rapport om händelserna i Scorched Grove är han inte beredd att göra mycket mer än så. Han är övertygad om sin ordens tro, men den traumatiska händelsen har gjort att han känner sig rädd och hjälplös. Om han bara kunde hitta modet att matcha sina ideal skulle han vara ämnad för storhet. Tevor är generellt sett ovillig att strida nu, men innan han anslöt sig till Tenders tränade han som rekryt till perch guard.

trait.name: Evasive
entries: The captain includes their Intelligence modifier as a bonus to their Dexterity saving throws.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The captain makes two attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Short sword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Short bow
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: The captain adds 2 to their AC against one melee attack that would hit them per round. The captain must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

Kaptener är respekterade bland banditstyrkorna och leder enheter på räder och bakhåll och leder ibland ett helt läger. Kaptenerna är bland de skickligare krigarna i koalitionen, men deras inblandning i de dagliga operationerna ger dem en viss kontakt med även banditer av lägre rang. Detta ledarskap, i kombination med deras skicklighet, gör att de kan samla eller ge efter för dem som är dumma nog att överväga att desertera. Vulpins, med sin naturliga ambition, list och personlighetskraft, kan lätt klättra upp till kaptensgrad.

trait.name: Evasive
entries: Fray includes her Intelligence modifier as a bonus to her Dexterity saving throws.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Fray makes two attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Short sword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Short bow
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: Fray adds 2 to their AC against one melee attack that would hit her per round. Fray must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

Fray är en stilig rödpälsad vulpin med skarpa ögon och ett snabbt sinne. Hon är en mycket skicklig svärdskvinna och blev utan hem när skogsbränder som spred sig från Scorched Grove brände ner hennes by. Hon såg anslutningen till banditerna som en möjlighet att använda sina färdigheter för att försörja sig själv och dem hon bryr sig om. Hon är smart och begåvad, men också tävlingsinriktad och ovillig att glömma minsta lilla förseelse mot henne. Fray använder sig av {@creature vulpin captain|Humblewood} stat-blocket.

trait.name: Evasive
entries: The noble includes their Intelligence modifier as a bonus to their Dexterity saving throws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) piercing damage.

action.name: Short sword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Disparaging Remark
entries: When a creature the noble can see makes an attack roll against an ally, the noble can use their reaction to impose disadvantage on that roll. The target of this effect must be able to hear and understand the noble.

Även om Alderheart grundades av fågelfolk är det hem för flera adliga familjer med inflytelserika humblefolk. Bland dem finns vulpiner, som finner både sin charm och sina list perfekt lämpade för de politiska intrigerna i Alderhearts höga samhälle. Vissa vulpin-adelsmän kan spåra sin härstamning tillbaka till gamla kungligheter.

trait.name: Evasive
entries: The priest includes their Intelligence modifier as a bonus on all Dexterity saving throws.

trait.name: Divine Eminence
entries: As a bonus action, the priest can expend a spell slot to cause their melee weapon attacks to magically deal an extra 10 ({@damage 3d6}) poison damage to a target on a hit. This benefit lasts until the end of the turn. If the priest expends a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the extra damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each level above 1st.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Mace
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6}) bludgeoning damage.

Präster från Amaranthine Kren vårdar helgedomar till hennes ära och delar historier om hennes list och slughet med besökare. Dessa berättelser betonar ödmjukhet och försiktighet och lär lyssnarna att alltid vara försiktiga. I sällsynta fall får dessa präster gudomliga gåvor av sin Amaranthine. De tilldelas en del av Krens övernaturliga slughet och försöker ofta ödmjuka dem som har blivit för stolta.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The priest is a 5th level spellcaster, their spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 13}, +5 to hit with spell attacks). The priest has the following cleric spells prepared:

trait.name: Evasive
entries: Shyla includes her Intelligence modifier as a bonus on all Dexterity saving throws.

trait.name: Divine Eminence
entries: As a bonus action, Shyla can expend a spell slot to cause her melee weapon attacks to magically deal an extra 10 ({@damage 3d6}) poison damage to a target on a hit. This benefit lasts until the end of the turn. If Shyla expends a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the extra damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each level above 1st.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Mace
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6}) bludgeoning damage.

Shyla är en ärrad, grå- och röttpälsad vulpinkleriker av Kren och tjänar som Kralls löjtnant. Krall räddade hennes liv när hon var ett barn, föräldralös i skogen, och hon har varit tacksam mot honom ända sedan dess. Hennes lojalitet mot Krall är absolut, och hon tror att Krall bara kommer att skära loss dem som inte kan dra sitt strå till stacken. Shyla använder sig av {@creature vulpin priest of kren|Humblewood} stat-blocket.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Shyla is a 5th level spellcaster, her spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 13}, +5 to hit with spell attacks). Shyla has the following cleric spells prepared:

monster.name: Walden Krane, Magistrate of Winnowing Reach
languages: can also understand Auran but can't speak it

trait.name: Glide
entries: When falling at least 10 feet, Bita can spend a reaction to fly up to her speed in one direction as she descends. She lands in an unoccupied space at the end of her movement, and takes no falling damage. She cannot glide while carrying heavy objects, heavy weapons, or shields (though she can drop any held items as part of her reaction).

trait.name: Talons
entries: Walden rolls advantage on Strength ({@skill Athletics}) checks made to climb any surface his talons could reasonably grip.

trait.name: Learned
entries: Walden gains proficiency in one of the following skills: {@skill Arcana}, {@skill History}, {@skill Nature}, or {@skill Religion}.

trait.name: Convincing
entries: Walden gains proficiency in his choice of the {@skill Deception} or {@skill Persuasion} skill. Additionally, he has advantage on all Charisma checks used to convince someone of their knowledge of anything pertaining to the skill he gained proficiency in from his Learned ability.

action.name: Rapier
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) piercing damage.

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: Walden adds 2 to his AC against one melee attack that would hit him. To do so, Walden must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

En kräsen, lätt upprörd, medelålders, tänd corvum med svart fjäderdräkt. Som magistrat i Winnowing Reach är han en framstående politisk person i regionen. Walden är inte en särskilt god eller snäll man, men han försöker vara en förnuftig och hederlig man. Han bryter inte sina avtal och tolererar likaså inte något från partiets sida som kan uppfattas som edsbrott, oärlighet eller handlingar som kan skada Reach. Han bryr sig djupt om sina medborgare, men det kommer ibland inte fram då hans politiska ambitioner tenderar att komma i vägen. Walden har känt Kenna Brightspark sedan hon var en ung flicka. Walden använder sig av {@creature noble} statblocket, justerat med rasegenskaperna hos en tänd corvum. Han är lagligt neutral.

data.name: Adventure in the Wood
entries: a tale from the wood

entries.name: Introduction
entries: The earth beneath Leya felt unusually warm. She reached down to confirm and pulled back in pain immediately. Her feathers were seared slightly. The season had been unusually dry, but this was a frightening temperature. After a closer look, it seemed like the ground was glowing.

CRACK! Leya's eyes went to the sound. The large tree she'd played in as a child had fallen, and smoke rose from its remains. "Go!" her mind yelled, and she listened, rushing towards home. "Get to them before—"

Suddenly, flames burst forth, travelling at an unearthly velocity towards Leya's perch. Her perch meant the world to her, but in the vast expanse of the Wood it was small and unimportant. Too insignificant for a Perch Guard outpost of its own. Her heart tightened knowing the remote settlement wouldn't be warned in time, and that aid would not be close by.

Leya's hands began to move without thought as she whispered the words of her grandmother. It wouldn't be enough, but she wouldn't be able to live with herself if she didn't try. When taught to her, the spell was meant to help farms through rainless seasons. It wasn't intended to be used defensively. Droplets of a lost cause formed between her fingers.

Conjured water fell to the ground, evaporating as soon as it hit the steaming forest floor. As she concentrated, a strong warm gust touched Leya's face. It's Altus, it must be! Leya thought. The Amaranthine of storms was bringing rain to quench this hateful wildfire. She looked to the sky, frantically searching for more signs of changing weather.

Barely able to register what she saw, her arms dropped to her sides in defeat. Flying balls of fire were filling up the sky. A swarm broke off, headed in her direction. Leya sank to her knees, hoping with her last thoughts that someone would save Humblewood before it all burned.

entries.name: Free Resources
entries: To supplement your Humblewood adventure, handouts, maps, tools and more are available at: {@link HUMBLEWOOD.COM/RESOURCES|https://humblewood.com/resources}

entries.name: Running the Campaign
entries: The following chapter contains a full adventure set in Humblewood that takes characters from levels 1 to 5. This chapter is meant for the GM's eyes only. It is recommended that you read the entire book, including the {@b Adventure in the Wood} chapter, prior to running it with your group. It is also assumed that you have read the 5th Edition Core Rules and Monster Books.
Information formatted in a box like this should be read out loud for players. This information is to be read when the party arrives at that point in the adventure.
Information formatted in a box like this is additional background information used to help shape the campaign. This information can be revealed to the players when necessary.

The challenges in this adventure were created with a balanced party of four players in mind. If your group has more or fewer players, consider adding or removing enemies in each encounter. Try to ensure players feel challenged, but not overwhelmed. The adventure can be played through in its entirety, or used as pieces for your own custom campaign. {@book Appendix E: Random Encounters|hwcs|9}, as well as the {@b Monster Cards}, and {@b NPC Cards} can be used to further flesh out the game.

Humblewood lies on the eastern coast of a vast continent, nestled in a valley between the towering Crest Mountains and the marshlands of the Mokk Fields. It is a mystical, secluded place that gets by quite well without much trade from the outside world, due to the fertility of the soil and an abundance of natural resources. The Wood has many skilled workers and artisans, and this, coupled with the supply of raw materials, makes Humblewood a great exporter.

The Wood has a diverse population, but the true power in Humblewood are the birdfolk. At the heart of their nation lies the great capital of Alderheart. The seat of commerce, art, and political power in the region, Alderheart has long been a refuge for those seeking fame, fortune, or protection.

Players will encounter some locations that are not extensively explained in this chapter. It is recommended that the information in the {@book Traversing the Wood|hwcs|3} chapter be used to help players understand their surroundings.

{@b {@i Monster and NPC Cards.}} In addition to their entries in {@book Appendix A: Bestiary|hwcs|5}, all the monsters and NPCs exclusive to this adventure have accompanying {@i The Deck of Many} cards for quick reference.

{@b {@i Character Advancement}}. For ease of play, the adventure has been structured with the milestone leveling rules in mind. Characters will level up automatically at the end of key story moments. For those groups using the standard XP rewards, there are experience point rewards for the social, puzzle, and other non-combat encounters provided alongside the milestone rewards. Otherwise, award standard XP for defeated foes as the players progress through the adventure.

entries.name: Overview
entries: There have been disturbing signs over the last few months, signalling that something is wrong in Humblewood. The troubles appear to originate from activity in the Scorched Grove, an ashen plain that was ravaged many centuries ago by a destructive fire. Whatever caused the fire has scarred the land with elemental magic, making it inhospitable to all but strange fire-based creatures. Of late, the Grove has begun to expand. At first, it was hard to notice the slow expansion, but those in tune with nature (especially the Tenders) could see the imbalance in the elemental forces of Humblewood. For many common folk, this imbalance has been experienced as unseasonal dryness, which has led to crop failure and an increased frequency of forest fires. There have also been a number of unusually aggressive emberbat clouds reported far outside of their natural ranges.

The true nature of the danger still remains hidden from the people of the Wood. A corvum necromancer named {@creature Odwald Ebonhart|Humblewood} has stirred the elemental {@creature aspect of fire|Humblewood}, which has lain dormant beneath the Scorched Grove since its first burning.
